title: Project Utilizing Systematic Instructional Design Models: Strengthening Professional Competencies in Social Fields

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational social science theories and basic competencies in professional fields (medical/legal/technical)
context.additional_context: Applying systematic instructional design models to solve social sector professional problems in smartphone-centric, resource-constrained technical environments.

learning_goals: The five stages of the ADDIE model (Analysis-Design-Development-Implementation-Evaluation) can be utilized to systematically plan professional practice projects in the social field
By integrating instructional design models with systems thinking, solutions are proposed that account for complex factors arising during professional problem-solving
Collaborative project outcomes are completed through continuous communication with PBL team members using smartphone-based collaboration tools

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
